last_episode_to_air.name: Kingdom of Kevin
last_episode_to_air.overview: Caught in a storm of controversy, Kevin learns a hard lesson in humility and considers the best course of action. Later, hindsight shifts his stance.

name: Kevin Hart: Don't F**k This Up
original_name: Kevin Hart: Don't F**k This Up
overview: Amid turmoil in his career and marriage, comedian and film star Kevin Hart opens up about his personal breakthroughs as he navigates crises and fame.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Amid turmoil in his career and marriage, comedian and film star Kevin Hart opens up about his personal breakthroughs as he navigates crises and fame.

episodes.name: 24/Kevin
episodes.overview: Months before a public scandal, Kevin Hart offers a glimpse into his ambitious schedule and remembers the woman responsible for his grueling work ethic.

episodes.name: Don't Be a Bitch
episodes.overview: Kevin examines his relationship with his father. He also introduces his wife and "road warriors" before getting blindsided by controversy.

episodes.name: What Happened in Vegas
episodes.overview: After a public and humiliating mistake, Kevin shares details surrounding the scandal that strained his marriage and brought him closer to his circle.

episodes.name: Bulletproof
episodes.overview: Kevin takes ownership of his actions following an intense argument. He then prepares for the release of the first film under his production company.

episodes.name: This Has to Work
episodes.overview: While embarking on a global tour, Kevin reflects on his comedic journey and the road to acceptance before receiving the biggest news of his career.

episodes.name: Kingdom of Kevin
episodes.overview: Caught in a storm of controversy, Kevin learns a hard lesson in humility and considers the best course of action. Later, hindsight shifts his stance.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Amid turmoil in his career and marriage, comedian and film star Kevin Hart opens up about his personal breakthroughs as he navigates crises and fame.
